mapper.select: SELECT a.F_ID,a.F_ONAME,a.F_TNAME,a.INTRO,a.SHOW,a.PUBLISH,a.ORIGIN,a.LANGUE,a.DIRECTOR,a.ACTOR,a.BROWSE,a.FTYPE,a.WRITERS,b.I_NAME,b.BIMG,c.LINK FROM MOVIE.FILM a LEFT JOIN MOVIE.IMAGE b ON a.BROWSE=b.I_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE.RESOURCE c ON a.BROWSE=c.F_ID LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT a.F_ID,a.F_ONAME,a.F_TNAME,a.INTRO,a.SHOW,a.PUBLISH,a.ORIGIN,a.LANGUE,a.DIRECTOR,a.ACTOR,a.BROWSE,a.FTYPE,a.WRITERS,b.I_NAME,b.BIMG,c.LINK FROM MOVIE.FILM a LEFT JOIN MOVIE.IMAGE b ON a.BROWSE=b.I_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE.RESOURCE c ON a.BROWSE=c.F_ID WHERE a.F_ID=#{fid_};

SELECT a.F_ID,a.F_ONAME,a.F_TNAME,a.INTRO,a.SHOW,a.PUBLISH,a.ORIGIN,a.LANGUE,a.DIRECTOR,a.ACTOR,a.BROWSE,a.FTYPE,a.WRITERS,b.I_NAME,b.BIMG,c.LINK FROM MOVIE.FILM a LEFT JOIN MOVIE.IMAGE b ON a.BROWSE=b.I_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE.RESOURCE c ON a.BROWSE=c.F_ID WHERE a.FTYPE LIKE #{search} LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MOVIE.FILM a LEFT JOIN MOVIE.IMAGE b ON a.BROWSE=b.I_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE.RESOURCE c ON a.BROWSE=c.F_ID WHERE a.FTYPE LIKE #{search}

SELECT a.F_ID,a.F_ONAME,a.F_TNAME,a.INTRO,a.SHOW,a.PUBLISH,a.ORIGIN,a.LANGUE,a.DIRECTOR,a.ACTOR,a.BROWSE,a.FTYPE,a.WRITERS,b.I_NAME,b.BIMG,c.LINK FROM MOVIE.FILM a LEFT JOIN MOVIE.IMAGE b ON a.BROWSE=b.I_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE.RESOURCE c ON a.BROWSE=c.F_ID WHERE a.FTYPE LIKE #{search} OR a.F_ONAME LIKE #{search} OR a.F_TNAME LIKE #{search} OR a.DIRECTOR LIKE #{search} OR a.WRITERS LIKE #{search} OR a.ACTOR LIKE #{search} LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MOVIE.FILM a LEFT JOIN MOVIE.IMAGE b ON a.BROWSE=b.I_ID LEFT JOIN MOVIE.RESOURCE c ON a.BROWSE=c.F_ID WHERE a.FTYPE LIKE #{search} OR a.F_ONAME LIKE #{search} OR a.F_TNAME LIKE #{search} OR a.DIRECTOR LIKE #{search} OR a.WRITERS LIKE #{search} OR a.ACTOR LIKE #{search} LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
